title: Ghostweaver

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Name an Evil Faction with Factional Chat to **Project** onto. At the end of the night, you will receive 3 messages sent in that Faction's Chat.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You will not see the name of the sender of these messages.
- Within these messages, any mentioned names of players in the faction are censored.
- If less than 3 messages were sent, you will see all of their messages.
- If no messages are sent or the faction doesn't exist, you are told no messages were sent.

desc:
Post 5440
*You use astral projection to receive odd visions.*
